structured.description: An application that ingests messages from a topic in a Quix stream processing platform and stores the extracted embeddings in a Qdrant database. The code utilizes the SentenceTransformer library to generate sentence embeddings using the all-MiniLM-L6-v2 model. It creates or retrieves a collection in Qdrant, where it uploads points containing the embeddings and metadata from incoming messages.

items.description: Processes a row containing page content and metadata, uploads it to Qdrant as a point vector, and updates a global count of ingested vectors. It handles empty page content by replacing it with a default value.

params.name: row
params.description: Expected to contain two keys: 'page_content' and 'metadata'. The 'page_content' key represents the content of a webpage. The 'metadata' key contains metadata information about the webpage, including a unique identifier ('uuid') and possibly other details.

items.name: ingest_vectors
